summary: The customer was looking for information about Contoso Wireless internet. The customer service agent provided information about the various internet speeds offered, which range from 4 Mbps to 100 Mbps, and the fact that there are no data caps. The cost of the services varies depending on the package chosen, starting at $19.99 per month and going up to $99.99 per month. Additionally, the customer service agent informed the customer that they offer 24/7 customer support in case any issues arise.
